overview: Girl Candy debuts Nica Noelle's latest kissing-themed series, with an emphasis on deep, passionate soul-kissing, lip biting, tongue sucking and neck nibbling. As these lustful lesbians bring each other to orgasm after passionate orgasm, their kisses become deeper and more intense, and you will feel as if you're right on the bed with them. Starring Sovereign Syre, Chloe Lynn, Lily Carter, Nina Hartley, April O'Neil, Tara Holiday, Alyssa Reese and Magdalene St. Michaels. Written and directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Deep Kissing Lesbians
